content: I'm excited to try out the Cucumber Lime Refresher with my new favorite gin, and I think the cucumber slice or wheel with a sprig of fresh mint will make a great garnish. Thanks for the tips on cooking quinoa, I'll definitely keep those in mind when making the vegan quinoa salad. Since I've been experimenting with different flavor combinations, I was thinking of trying out some new herbs and spices to add more depth to my dishes. Do you have any recommendations for some unique herbs or spices that I might not have tried before?
